Umuahia Township Stadium bụ ámá egwuregwu dị na Umuahia Nigeria
Ọ bụkwa ebe obibi Abia Warriors FC nke Nigeria Premier League
Abia Comets FC na -egwukwa egwuregwu ụlọ ha na ohu ama ahụ
Amá egwuregwu nke a nwere ike ibanye mmadụ puku ise
Enweela nkatọ zuru ebe niile n'ihi elu ala ama egwuregwu ahụ adịghị mma cha cha.
